WorkItem.Description:
Test:
----
$reader = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createReader('Excel2007');
$excel = $reader->load('read.xlsx');
 
$writer = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createWriter($excel, 'HTML');
$writer->save('write.html');
 
Expected result:
----
Row heights are (approximately) the same in exported HTML as in original Excel file
 
Actual result:
----
Row heights too small
 
Screen shots:
----
Original: http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/5124/rowheightreadxlsx.png
HTML Export: http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/5569/rowheightwritehtml.png
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel 1.6.7
WorkItem.Summary: Inaccurate row heights with HTML writer
